title: Interface SeCe-IT_Manage SIN+ Service Items in SN
description:
Description
Integrate the SeCe-IT service catalog including the SIN-ID and the service model defined by SeCe-IT (according to SeCe-IT Service Items) in SN@TC.
Develop the constructors for creating the interface object for the interface (TMF 622) to SeCe-IT.
  Checklist
DoR Enabler Feature Status  
Benefit Hypothesis includes: * Business Value is clearly stated
Acceptance criteria are defined.
acceptance_criteria: The SeCe-IT service catalog including the SIN-ID and the defined service model (according to SeCe-IT service items) is fully integrated in SN@TC and supplies the constructor with the data required to create the interface object.
The constructors for the interface (TMF 622) to SeCe-IT are available and generate a complete interface object required by the interface.
